Convermax Rockford Turn Theme

Rockford Turn is a distinctive auto parts theme inspired by racing cars and ideal for accelerating your store performance.

Visit demo website#

Theme installation#

To install the theme in your store, open the Shopify admin panel. Go to Sales Channels > Themes. Scroll to Theme library and upload theme file.

After the file is uploaded, press Customize, to configure the theme for your store.

Using Rockford Turnâ€™s Documentation#

On the left sidebar, you can find links to pages. Every page will guide you to make adjustments to the theme. Read the guides to learn how to configure different sections to match your taste.

Support#

If you have questions that are not covered in the guides, feel free to write us an email at support@convermax.com. So that we can solve a problem fast, make sure to include these details in your letter: what your query is about, your store URL, screenshot that might be helpful.

We usually respond in 24 hours.
